name: Clear Mason Jar With Teal Floral Detail
description:
These pint size painted mason jars are the perfect decoration piece for your wedding, reception or simply as a home decor item!

These jars are clear with a painted teal floral detail.  Jar is painted on the exterior and the interior is not painted so they can be filled with water. 

Exterior is finished with a clear protective coat. Lids and bands are included.

*Do not put in dishwasher, do not submerge in water and do not drink from. This set was designed for decoration purposes.

ALL ITEMS MADE IN THE USA. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $12.00.
